EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 11_Managing dynamic workloads
EmailTemplate.subject: Managing dynamic workloads in an OpenStack world
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Practical know-how based on industry experience Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Moving from a trial to a real-world OpenStack production environment means you’re already changing the game. Of course that’s not always easy.
Check out the TechTarget white paper, “Beyond the Trial: Fulfilling OpenStack’s Promise of Dynamism <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2392.Fulfilling.OpenStacks.Promise.of.Dynamism.V2.html?did=d000000000ao&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 11b-managingdynamicworkloadsWP&utm_term=finance]]>”, to get insights on the challenges and solutions for managing dynamic workloads in complex, multiple data center environments.
I hope that you enjoy this white paper! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
